features.feature: UX 视觉升级焕新，打造全新的 OS 视觉体验
新增 Turbo X 性能引擎平台界面，性能优化效果看得见
新增侧滑退出/桌面滑动过程中的启动并行响应
优化应用启动退出场景动效曲线，更舒适，更流畅
优化相机使用性能，使用过程更流畅
优化输入法打字体验，打字更流畅
新增支持悬浮窗截屏，截屏后可一步选择悬浮窗区域
新增 AI 截屏功能，智能学习使用场景和习惯，自动推荐所需服务，让操作更随心
截屏编辑后保存支持覆盖原图选项
新增与 iPhone 碰一碰互传文件功能。IOS 上需安装荣耀互联 APP (1.1.18312 及以上版本)
新增与 macOS、Windows 互传功能，在电脑安装“荣耀超级工作台”即可互传图片、视频与文件
支持 android 原生极暗模式 (降低白点值)。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 无障碍 > 极暗
开启后支持圆点颜色自定义、乘车自动开启。体验路径：设置 > 辅助功能 > 晕动舒缓显示
图库视频播放支持帧预览，快速浏览锁定指定帧
媒体播控卡片新增进度条调节，可随意调整进度
录屏接入灵动胶囊
任意位置支持横划切换至通知中心，操作更方便
优化状态栏三方应用通知图标显示效果，提升显示一致性
优化系统稳定性，提高用户整机使用体验
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用 3. 更新过程中，如果遇到任何问题，请拨打荣耀品牌服务热线或至荣耀品牌客户服务中心寻求支持
The upgraded interface design delivers a new look for the OS
The new Turbo X performance engine interface makes optimization visible
When you swipe to exit or swipe on the home screen, the system can perform parallel operations
Optimizes the animation curves for launching or exiting apps, delivering a more fluid and comfortable experience
Enhances the Camera performance for smoother usage
Improves the typing experience with a more responsive keyboard
You can take a screenshot that includes a floating window and easily select the floating window area in one step
AI screenshot can intelligently learn from your usage scenarios and habits to automatically recommend the services you need, making operations simpler
After editing a screenshot, you can save it to replace the original image
Simply tap your device against an iPhone to transfer files. Ensure that the Honor Connect app (v1.1.18312 or later) is installed on the iOS device
Install HONOR Workstation on your macOS or Windows computer to easily transfer images, videos, and files between your Honor device and the computer
Supports Android's native extra dim mode, which reduces the white point value. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Accessibility > Extra dim
Motion Sickness Relief now includes an auto-enable feature during driving, and you can customize the dot color. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Motion Sickness Relief
You can now quickly browse videos and easily locate specific frames in Gallery
The media control card features a progress bar, making it easy to adjust the playback
The screen recording function is now integrated into Magic Capsule
You can swipe horizontally from anywhere in the Control Center to quickly switch to the Notification Center
Improves the display of third-party app notification icons in the status bar for a more unified look
Improves the system stability to optimize the user experience

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating 2. Discover more information on product features in Tips 3. If you encounter any issues during the update, you can get our help by calling Honor service hotline or visiting Honor Customer Service Center
